page.title: 10ROCKWELL GREEN,WELLINGTON
page.content: Rockwell Green is on the westerly outskirts of Wellington.It is situated on ground under which there is reputed to be much water.Certainly a few years ago the local water came from the Bore Holes.There are 3 Nurseries in this area which get their supply of water from the Bore Holes.These are flower nurseries,mainly Chrysanthemums.Large greenhouses are very evident on the local landscape. The village has its own Church,Church Hall,Village Hall & Primary School V.C It also has a Post Office,Launderette ,2 Village Stores,a Hairdressers,an Antiques Shop,2 Butchers and a Fish'n'Chip Take-away.
